mapper.select: SELECT C.C_NO, C.C_ID, C.C_NICKNAME, C.C_EMAIL, C.C_PHONE, C.C_BIRTH, PP.PRO_ORIGIN, PP.PRO_RENAME, C.C_STATUS FROM CLIENT C LEFT JOIN PROFILEPHOTO PP ON (C.C_NO = PP.C_NO) WHERE C.C_NO = #{cNo}
